seo_data.meta_title: Advanced Therapy Body Wash Fragrance-Free | Lubriderm®
seo_data.meta_description: Soothe and hydrate itchy, dry skin with our Advanced Therapy Fragrance-Free Body Wash. This creamy, soothing formula with Pro-Ceramide, Vitamin E, and Pro-Vitamin B5 (Panthenol) is designed to gently lift away dirt, excess oil, and impurities, leaving itchy, dry, and sensitive skin feeling healthy and more resilient.
